sentences.en: Dear children, what would you feel if you have a talking bookcase in your room?
sentences.cn: 亲爱的孩子们，如果你的房间里有一架会说话的书柜如何？

sentences.en: Gil rose and went to his bookcase and took down a volume.
sentences.cn: 吉尔站起身，走到书架跟前，取下一本书。

sentences.en: He built in a bookcase between the windows .
sentences.cn: 他在窗与窗之间加设了书橱。

sentences.en: He built in a bookcase between the windows.
sentences.cn: 他在窗与窗之间加设了书橱.

sentences.en: He crammed all his books into the small bookcase.
sentences.cn: 他把他所有的书都塞进小书橱里。

sentences.en: He improvised a bookcase out of crates.
sentences.cn: 他用板条箱临时做成书架.

sentences.en: He reverentially returned the novel to a glass-fronted bookcase.
sentences.cn: 他毕恭毕敬地把小说放回了正面装有玻璃的书架。

sentences.en: His tables and chairs are still in the Elysee Palace in Paris and his sofas, bookcase and desk adorn other rooms.
sentences.cn: 波林的桌子和椅子仍在在法国巴黎的爱丽舍宫，而他的沙发，书柜和书桌，也装饰着其他的房间。

sentences.en: I have a bookcase in the room.
sentences.cn: 我有一个书架在房间里。

sentences.en: I would say the bookcase contains about 100 books.
sentences.cn: 我估计这个书橱装有上千册书.

sentences.en: Put the books away neatly in the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 把书整齐地放到书柜里.

sentences.en: Reading in a pedantic way may turn you into a bookworm or a bookcase, and has long been opposed.
sentences.cn: 读死书会变成书呆子,甚至于成为书橱, 早有人反对过了.

sentences.en: That selfish student always appropriates the biggest bookcase and desk.
sentences.cn: 那个自私的学生总是占用最大的书橱和书桌。

sentences.en: The bookcase contains fifty volumes but holds a hundred.
sentences.cn: 这书橱装有50册书,但它能装下100册.

sentences.en: The bookcase fits neatly into the alcove.
sentences.cn: 书架正好放得进壁凹。

sentences.en: There are many interesting book in our bookcase.
sentences.cn: 有很多有趣的书在我们的书架。

sentences.en: There was no desk, no bookcase, not even a table, only the nasty couch, with a typewriter on another milk crate in front of it.
sentences.cn: 既没有写字台，也没有书柜，甚至连一张桌子都没有。 只有一个肮脏的沙发，还有摆在它前面的另一个牛奶箱，以及那上面的一台打字机。

sentences.en: This bookcase has five shelves.
sentences.cn: 这书架有五格.

sentences.en: This bookcase is too unstable to hold so many books.
sentences.cn: 这书橱很不结实,装不了这么多书.

sentences.en: We crammed more than a hundred books into the small bookcase.
sentences.cn: 我们把一百多本书塞进了这个小书箱里.

sentences.en: We went for the bottle of whiskey that we had stashed behind the bookcase.
sentences.cn: 我们去拿那瓶藏在书架后面的威士忌。

sentences.en: You buy this bookcase in sections and slot them together.
sentences.cn: 你分组件买这个书橱,再把它们卡榫对准组合在一起.

trans.tran_en: a piece of furniture with shelves to hold books
